繳.definition: to hand in; to hand over; to pay; to capture (weapons); to seize

繳交.definition: to hand in; to hand over; to pay (a fee etc)

繳付.definition: to pay; to hand over (tax payment etc)

繳械.definition: to disarm; (of an enemy) to lay down one's weapons; to surrender

繳槍.definition: to lay down one's arms; to surrender; to disarm

繳槍不殺.definition: “surrender and your life will be spared”

繳銷.definition: to hand in for cancellation (e.g. a license)
